body_html: Hi @gut, indeed we were working on the same thing. Could you please check out https://gist.github.com/pedropgusmao/fe283d613a3f47ea57b3bf6f81f85fed and see if it works for you. Right now I get 147/157 passing tests. The ones that are not passing are: test_linspace, test_logspace, test_gather, test_scatter, test_scatterFill, test_masked_copy, test_view, test_unsqueeze test_numpy_unresizable and test_apply. Exceptions are of type THArgException and THException

body: Hi @gut, indeed we were working on the same thing. Could you please check out https://gist.github.com/pedropgusmao/fe283d613a3f47ea57b3bf6f81f85fed and see if it works for you. Right now I get 147/157 passing tests. The ones that are not passing are:  `test_linspace`, `test_logspace`, `test_gather`, `test_scatter`, `test_scatterFill`, `test_masked_copy`, `test_view`, `test_unsqueeze` `test_numpy_unresizable` and `test_apply`. Exceptions are of type `THArgException` and `THException`
